mapper.select: SELECT T1.CD as JOBTYPECD ,T1.CDNM as JOBTYPENM FROM TCCM_CODE T1 WHERE T1.SURVSEQ = #{SURVSEQ} AND T1.SURVKINDCD = #{SURVKINDCD} AND T1.CDTYPE = '2001' AND T1.CD !='GROUPCD'

SELECT JOBTYPEGROUPCD , JOBTYPEGROUPNM , MAX(ORDERSEQ )AS ORDERSEQ , MAX(JOBTYPECD ) AS JOBTYPECD , MAX(CHGROUPID) AS CHGROUPID FROM TCCM_JOBCODE WHERE SURVSEQ = #{SURVSEQ} AND SURVKINDCD = #{SURVKINDCD} GROUP BY JOBTYPEGROUPCD,JOBTYPEGROUPNM ORDER BY ORDERSEQ , JOBTYPECD
